## LiveSelector.sort() method

Sorts an array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sort(compareFn?: (a: T, b: T) => number): LiveSelector<T, SingleMode>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

compareFn


</td><td>

(a: T, b: T) =&gt; number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The name of the function used to determine the order of the elements. If omitted, the elements are sorted in ascending, ASCII character order.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[LiveSelector](./kit.liveselector.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, SingleMode&gt;

## Example


```ts
ls.sort((a, b) => a.innerText.length - b.innerText.length)
```
